alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 8:17AM MDT until June 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Fort Morgan affecting Morgan County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Platte River at Fort Morgan. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The lowest areas along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain at 15.6 feet through today. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
